response: reasoning='The glider must cover 4000m horizontally while diving to 400m. The glide angle θ is determined by the V-shape path: tanθ = 400/2000 = 0.2 → θ ≈ 11.3°. Vehicle volume V is chosen as 0.7 m³ to meet energy constraints. Using V=0.7 m³, dry mass = 0.7*1025 = 717.5 kg. Ballast mass m_b is set to 517.5 kg to ensure ascent mass (717.5 - 517.5 = 200 kg) meets the minimum mass requirement. Total energy consumption is (280 + 102.5*0.7)*2040/3600 ≈ 199.3 Wh ≤ 200 Wh. All constraints (volume range, mass ≥200 kg, energy ≤200 Wh, density ≤1025 kg/m³) are satisfied.' config=ConfigFile(angle=11.3, volume=0.7, mass=517.5)
